des: "The perfect Spring or Summer drink. Tried and tested for over 12 years now. and always a crowd favorite!  This recipe yields one gallon!! Use a 1 gallon sun tea jar for serving!"
ins: In a large jar or drink cooler, combine the light rum, dark rum, 151 rum, orange liqueur, almond syrup, simple syrup, and lime juice. Stir and top off with orange juice. Do not use grenadine if you want the true Mai Tai! Serve in 8 to 12 ounce glasses with ice.
